nodes.text: Big Sturg Ganna was a male Whippomorn gangster who operated in Canto Bight. Early in his life, he worked as a lawyer and holo-show host before turning to politics. He served as a councilor in Canto Bight for over 20 years with one term being cut short due to a felony conviction.
He sought the masseuse Lexo Sooger, hoping to acquire him as an asset. At some point Ganna kidnapped Sooger's daughter Lula.
He was an amphibious being with a ticklish tail. His body was covered in a layer of blubber that keeps him warm in his native environment, and he liked to spend time in cold water tanks.
